H0.text: in which country bikram sambhat the official calender. India

H1.text: in which country bikram sambhat the official calender. Bhutan

H2.text: in which country bikram sambhat the official calender. Sri Lanka

H3.text: in which country bikram sambhat the official calender. Nepal

A4.text: Vikram Samvat is an official calendar of Nepal.

A5.text: Unlike India where it is used only for religious dates, the solar version of Vikram Samvat is an official calendar used for everything from school sessions to legal contracts to any official functions.
